00028 #define EBUILDER(_name) char *_name[] = {\
00029 "[Settings]",\
00030 "Event ID = WORD : 1",\
00031 "Trigger mask = WORD : 1",\
00032 "Buffer = STRING : [32] SYSTEM",\
00033 "Format = STRING : [32] MIDAS",\
00034 "User build = BOOL : n",\
00035 "User Field = STRING : [64] ",\
00036 "Event mask = DWORD : 3",\
00037 "Hostname = STRING : [64] ",\
00038 "",\
00039 "[Statistics]",\
00040 "Events sent = DOUBLE : 0",\
00041 "Events per sec. = DOUBLE : 0",\
00042 "kBytes per sec. = DOUBLE : 0",\
00043 "",\
00044 NULL }

00073 typedef struct {
00074     WORD      event_id;
00075     WORD      trigger_mask;
00076     char      buffer[32];
00077     char      format[32];
00078     BOOL      user_build;
00079     char      user_field[64];
00080     DWORD     emask;
00081     char      hostname[64];
00082   } EBUILDER_SETTINGS;
